title: Stocks lurch lower, bonds jump as virus variant spooks investors
content:
1. Stocks lurch lower, bonds jump as virus variant spooks investors  Reuters
  2. Dow futures plunge nearly 600 points amid fears of new Covid variant found in South Africa  CNBC
  3. Stocks and oil prices fall as new Covid variant spooks markets  Financial Times
  4. Dow futures tumble 400 points on fears over new COVID variant detected in South Africa  MarketWatch
  5. NIFTY goes for a nosedive; new COVID-19 variant spooks global markets | Top Headlines  ET NOW
